title: Deep Delver
content:
ding it.

Countless hands have smoothened the half and sharpened the blade. This is an ancestral weapon - perhaps dating back to the ancient digs that sundered thhe duergar from their dwarf-kin.

Deep Delver Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found at Grymforge (near X-631, Y326) Dropped by: Elder Brithvar loot

Deep Delver Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 400 Gp. Weight: 0.9 Kg. ID:

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandr
